title: How to Use SCÜNCI Steamer for Your Easy Housecleaning Chores

steps.headline: Fill up the measurement cup (available in the package) with cold water.
Remove (unscrew) the cap from the steamer and pour water using  the funnel (available in the package).
Put a cap back and plug in the steamer.
Wait 5 minutes until water gets steamy.
Choose the appropriate attachment from the package and screw in to the hose.
steps.description: Hint: a narrow attachment works best in the corners and small hard-to-reach places.

steps.headline: Point the hose to the place(s) to be cleaned and push a handle to start working.
steps.description: BE VERY CAREFUL as the steam is strong and hot

steps.headline: Continue working the steamer until you see the place clean and free of dirt.
Take a cloth or a paper towel to wipe off any grime that might have been left behind by the steamed up water.
steps.description: Hint: If you clean  shower rails and the black residue dropped into the shower floor just grab the shower head and wash it all off.

steps.headline: Don't remove the cap right away, when you finish cleaning.
steps.description: Simply unplug the steamer,  but do NOT remove a cap right away because the steam pressure will burn your hands.

steps.headline: Wait 5-7 minutes before removing a cap.
Repeat the process, adding more cold water, if you need to continue with this steamer.
steps.description: If you have to continue working, pour cold water into the device again and repeat the whole process from step #2 and on.
